name: Cloudinary
description: Cloudinary allows any web application to manage all images in the cloud: upload, resize, crop, detect faces, Facebook & Twitter support, fast CDN delivery.

apis.name: Cloudinary
apis.description: Cloudinary is a softwareu2013as-a-service (SaaS) solution hosted in the Cloud. Cloudinary is built using modern web development frameworks and leverages Amazon Web Servicesu2019 (AWS) cloud-solutions. Cloudinary manages your web applicationu2019s resources in the cloud. The resources are delivered from high-performance servers through Content Delivery Networks. Resources are uploaded, managed, and transformed using Cloudinaryu2019s easy to use APIs. Image upload, processing, and delivery are done on Cloudinaryu2019s servers and automatically scale for handling high load and bursts of traff
